Class QueueInfoDAORedisImpl

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.meta.dao.impl.QueueInfoDAORedisImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueueInfoDAO
public class QueueInfoDAORedisImpl extends Object implements QueueInfoDAO
QueueInfoDAORedisImpl gets queue information from Redis.
Author:
Greg Haines, Animesh Kumar
